about_the_game:
◆Story

When a strange and eerie figure swept by, when a cat demon descended upon me with a huge katana, when infected by a “blood cicada”... what would I do...would I scream...
No, I would thank them…It was them that helped me make the acquaintance of my...spiritual support I had hoped to see within me? No, rather, she was my...spiritual god...?

The cat demon of nine lives, Hitomi.

[“It's hard to keep up with me.”]
I was captivated by her. Even though she was a cat demon, yet...that emotion that came from within, it felt amazing. We spent a lot of time…together...But I never had much courage to take a step forward...

[“Take care of yourself until I get back, won’t you, Yi.”]
In a sudden attack, a samurai figure stabbed Hitomi... After that, I had a moment of courage…and confessed my love to her…
But she left, for some reason. She said, it was to make up for some fault she had made, an inevitable fault.
I waited for her for a long, long time...My demonisation was getting worse, and I was having a hard time distinguishing reality from illusion.



[...Hitomi, I am going to wait for you to come back, not for you to “come back”.]
Hitomi…bad cat, wait for me, I must find you. I know you have been watching me, unti...
You left me.

◆Gameplay Instructions

This is a normal galgame. You can navigate the plot to get hints for new plots, etc..

◆Game Features

◇Two main female characters
◇Game endings: 1 type

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Intertwined Fate with a Cat Demon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The human, Yi, was accidentally infected by a “blood cicada” on the road and ran into Hitomi, a cat demon who was hunting the blood cicada. Faced by Yi, the human who was scared and also infected, the cat demon chose to stay with Yi, in order to protect and to observe her…
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
